an10.100:1: "Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ. Katame dasa? Rāgaṁ, dosaṁ, mohaṁ, kodhaṁ, upanāhaṁ, makkhaṁ, paḷāsaṁ, issaṁ, macchariyaṁ, mānaṁ – ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an10.100:2: Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ. Katame dasa? Rāgaṁ, dosaṁ, mohaṁ, kodhaṁ, upanāhaṁ, makkhaṁ, paḷāsaṁ, issaṁ, macchariyaṁ, mānaṁ – ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātun"ti.
an10.100:3: Kāmabhogī bhayaṁ diṭṭhi,vajjiyamāhituttiyā;Kokanudo āhuneyyo,thero upāli abhabboti.
